name: IndianRecipesDosa
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make dosa
des:
This skill will show you how to make an authentic restaurant styled Indian Dosa. 

To start the skill ask or say..
 Alexa, make dosa or Alexa, start make dosa.

You can ask for the list of ingredients, or just say begin cooking if you are ready. Once you are cooking, just say Next to advance to the next step in the recipe. You can also pause the recipe at any time by saying Pause.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
